name: birkle IT
tagline: Your Reliable IT Partner.Explore the Possibilities
description:
We are a rapidly growing IT consulting company, specialized in the digitalization of enterprises.
We develop innovative and competitive solutions for our renowned customers. No project equals another and we guarantee exciting, ambitious projects and a multitude of possible applications!
We offer the best opportunities for development with an above-average remuneration and a workplace in the heart of Munich, Germany and in our new IT Center of Excellence in Tallinn, Estonia.
